T02D2727:95a-1: shr'i kharsa p'a na lo ka n'a tha s'a dha na n'a ma /
T02D2727:95a-3: dpal 'jig rten mgon po la spyod pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D2727:95a-4: 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2727:95a-5: dpal ldan mngon 'dod 'bras bu ster ba'i gzi ldan dpag bsam rkang 'thung ni //
T02D2727:95a-6: bde bar gshegs rnams bzhed pa'i don chen bzod mdzad ded dpon chen po ste //
T02D2727:95a-7: srid dang zhi ba mnyam pa'i dngos gyur dngos po kun gyi ngo bo nyid //
T02D2727:95a-8: phyag na padma de yis 'gro ba'i sdig pa zhi bar mdzad du gsol //
T02D2727:95a-9: skye bos dben pa'i gnas dag tu //
T02D2727:95a-10: sngar langs kha gdong dag byas nas //
T02D2727:95a-11: 'jam pa'i stan la yang dag gnas //
T02D2727:95a-12: snying gar zla rgyas 'od gsal ba'i //
T02D2727:95a-13: steng du rang gi sa bon bsam //
T02D2727:95a-14: snying ga'i zla 'od kyis sa bon //
T02D2727:95a-15: yongs bskul de yi sa bon gyis //
T02D2727:95a-16: kharsa p'a na mgon dpal ldan //
T02D2727:95a-17: bla ma sangs rgyas de sras mchog / mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drangs la //
T02D2727:95a-18: sa bon de dag las byung ba'i //
T02D2727:95a-19: sna tshogs mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod //
T02D2727:95a-20: de nas mngon par phyag byas nas //
T02D2727:95a-21: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya //
T02D2727:95a-22: thog med 'khor bar gang zhig rnam 'khor che //
T02D2727:95a-23: bdag gis mi dge bgyis dang bgyid stsal ba'am //
T02D2727:95a-24: gzhan gyis bgyis la rjes su yi rang ba //
T02D2727:95a-25: thams cad bcom ldan rnams kyis spyan sngar bshags //
T02D2727:95a-26: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang rgyal sras 'phags rnams dang //
T02D2727:95a-27: gzhan dag gis kyang dge ba gang bgyis la //
T02D2727:95a-28: rjes su yi rang de dag ma lus pa //
T02D2727:95a-29: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo //
T02D2727:95a-30: snying rje dam pa las 'khrungs pa'i //
T02D2727:95a-31: sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2727:95a-32: chos kun ro gcig rang bzhin can //
T02D2727:95a-33: gos pa med pa'i chos dag dang //
T02D2727:95a-34: rab dga' la sogs sar bzhugs pa'i //
T02D2727:95a-35: byang sems rnams la'ang de bzhin no //
T02D2727:95a-36: sangs rgyas mya ngan 'da' bzhed gyur pa rnams //
T02D2727:95a-37: gzhan la phan phyir yun du bzhugs par gsol //
T02D2727:95b-0: sgrib pa thams @95b cad dpyis 'byin gyur pa yi //
T02D2727:95b-1: rgyur gyur byang chub sems ni bskyed bgyi zhing //
T02D2727:95b-2: bde gshegs rnam dag lam gyi dgongs pa dang //
T02D2727:95b-3: rtag par yang dag kun nas bsten par bgyi //
T02D2727:95b-4: de nas rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'gro ba 'di dag kun //
T02D2727:95b-5: gcig dang du ma rnam bral stong pa nyid du rnam bsam bya //
T02D2727:95b-6: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma konya\ham /
T02D2727:95b-7: zhes bya bas stong pa nyid lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2727:95b-8: chos 'di dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis yongs
T02D2727:95b-9: su dag pa'o zhes lhag par gnas pa de ltar
T02D2727:95b-10: bdag nyid la'ang kun du bltas nas /
T02D2727:95b-11: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a wa shuddhony\ham /
T02D2727:95b-13: de nas sgom pa pos sngon gyi smon lam gyis
T02D2727:95b-14: yang dag par bskul ba'i rnam par shes pa tsam
T02D2727:95b-15: gyi pam yig yongs su gyur pa las kha dog
T02D2727:95b-17: aa yig las skyes pa'i dri ma med pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa /
T02D2727:95b-18: de'i steng du hr'i:yig 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis nam
T02D2727:95b-19: mkha'i khyon kun yang dag par gsal ba bsam par
T02D2727:95b-20: bya zhing / de yongs su gyur pa las padma'i
T02D2727:95b-21: snying por rang gi sa bon 'od zer gyi phreng
T02D2727:95b-22: bas brgyan pa lta bar bya'o //
T02D2727:95b-23: de nas 'di dag yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das su bsam par bya ste /
T02D2727:95b-24: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od ltar dkar ba'i sku can /
T02D2727:95b-25: ral pa bcings pa la dbu rgyan dang /
T02D2727:95b-26: spyi gtsug tu 'od dpag med bkod pa /
T02D2727:95b-27: sna tshogs padma dang zla ba la skyil grung phyed pas bzhugs pa /
T02D2727:95b-28: sku la mchog gi rgyan dang ldan zhing /
T02D2727:95b-30: brgyad gnyis lon pa'i lang tsho can /
T02D2727:95b-31: phyag g-yas mchog sbyin dang g-yon pa sdong bu dang bcas pa'i padma 'dzin pa /
T02D2727:95b-32: de'i 'og tu mdog lhag par nag pa'i yi dags gdong pa gyen du phyogs shing kha gdangs pa /
T02D2727:95b-33: gre ba khab kyi mig can /
T02D2727:95b-35: shin tu rid pa rnams phyag nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun
T02D2727:95b-36: sim par 'bab pa mthong bas tshim par mdzad pa
T02D2727:95b-37: / snying rjes brlan pa'i dpal dang ldan zhing gru 'dzin gyi ri bo'i spo la bzhugs pa /
T02D2727:95b-38: lhag par zhi bas rnam par gzigs pa can /
T02D2727:95b-39: sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa /
T02D2727:95b-40: sna tshogs pa'i mtshan rnams kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2727:95b-41: de'i mdun du sgrol ma dang /
T02D2727:95b-42: g-yas logs su gzhan nu nor bzangs so //
T02D2727:96a-1: ljang gu phyag g-yon pas sdong bu dang bcas pa'i autpa la 'dzin cing /
T02D2727:96a-2: g-yas pas kha 'byed pa'i tshul can /
T02D2727:96a-3: sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02D2727:96a-4: lang tsho gzhon zhing nu 'bur rgyas pa'o //
T02D2727:96a-5: gzhon nu nor bzangs gser gyi mdog can /
T02D2727:96a-8: mchan khung g-yon du glegs bam bcug pa /
T02D2727:96a-9: rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2727:96a-10: rgyab tu khro gnyer can dang /
T02D2727:96a-12: de la khro gnyer can ser mo /
T02D2727:96a-14: ral ba'i cha shas rdzogs pa /
T02D2727:96a-15: g-yon pas dbyu gu gsum pa dang /
T02D2727:96a-17: g-yas pas phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul dang /
T02D2727:96a-20: rta mgrin mdog dmar po thung zhing gsus pa 'phyang ba /
T02D2727:96a-21: skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba /
T02D2727:96a-22: sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs dang ldan pa /
T02D2727:96a-23: bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la smar dmar ser gyis sbras pa /
T02D2727:96a-24: spyan gsum dmar zhing zlum pa /
T02D2727:96a-25: khro gnyer dang smin ma 'khyug pa /
T02D2727:96a-26: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs 'phyang ba /
T02D2727:96a-27: g-yon pas dbyug pa'i mtshon cha dang /
T02D2727:96a-28: g-yas pas phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul can te /
T02D2727:96a-29: 'di dag thams cad rang gi gtso bo la ji
T02D2727:96a-30: ltar mdzes pa'i mig dag gis blta zhing 'dug pa
T02D2727:96a-32: de nas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hr'i: yig bsams la /
T02D2727:96a-33: de las rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'od zer 'phros pas /
T02D2727:96a-34: khams gsum po yongs su gang zhing sems can thams
T02D2727:96a-35: cad 'jig rten dbang phyug gi go 'phang la rab
T02D2727:96a-36: tu bkod nas / slar yang 'od zer de /
T02D2727:96a-37: sa bon gyi yi ge de la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2727:96a-38: phyi nas 'od zer de nyid kyis ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te /
T02D2727:96a-39: dam tshig sems dpa' dang chu dang 'o ma 'dres
T02D2727:96a-40: pa ltar gcig tu gyur pa'i skur bsam par bya'o
T02D2727:96a-41: // de nas lus ngag yid gsum rnam par dag par bya bya ste /
T02D2727:96a-42: rim pa ji lta bar spyi bor aom yig dkar po dang /
T02D2727:96a-43: mgrin par a'a: yig dmar po dang /
T02D2727:96a-44: thugs kar h'um yig sngon po rnams bsams la /
T02D2727:96a-45: 'di rnams las mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer gyi dra brtag tu 'phros pas /
T02D2727:96a-46: sems can gyi phung po thams cad kyi sdig pa'i
T02D2727:96a-47: tshogs gzhom par bya'o zhes nus pa ji lta bas
T02D2727:96b-0: @96b rnal 'byor brtson ldan sgom pa po //
T02D2727:96b-1: sgrib pa rab spong shes rab dang //
T02D2727:96b-2: skal bzang nad med phun sum tshogs //
T02D2727:96b-4: bsgoms pas du ba na sems rtse gcig pas bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D2727:96b-7: 'di rnams ston ka'i rgyu skar dri ma med ba'i
T02D2727:96b-8: phreng ba lta bu'i kha dog dang 'od kyi snang
T02D2727:96b-9: ba can bas / 'od zer du ma 'phro bas bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2727:96b-10: dub par gyur na bsod nams yongs su bsdo zhing /
T02D2727:96b-11: langs pa ji ltar bde bar lha'i nga rgyal gyis gnas par bya'o //
T02D2727:96b-12: dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug gi //
T02D2727:96b-13: yid 'ong sgrub thabs bgyis pa yis //
T02D2727:96b-14: bdag gis bsod nams gang thob des //
T02D2727:96b-16: dpal ldan 'jig rten mgon po kharsa p'a na'i sgrub
T02D2727:96b-17: thabs zhes bya ba grub chen padma 'byung gnas zhabs
T02D2727:96b-20: // / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta chen po shr'i ba na ratna'i zhal snga nas dang /
T02D2727:96b-21: chos 'khor lo ts'a bas bsgyur ba las /
